snippet: Audience members and actors in India have taken issue with a sequence from "The Avengers" set in the slums of Kolkata (formerly known as Calcutta), saying it emphasizes the most negative aspects of that city.
abstract: Audience members and actors in India have taken issue with a sequence from "The Avengers" set in the slums of Kolkata (formerly known as Calcutta), saying it emphasizes the most negative aspects of that city.

headline.main: Slum Scenes in 'The Avengers' Are Criticized in India
headline.print_headline: Slum Scenes in ‘The Avengers’ Are Criticized in India
